contents.text: Welcome to NoRedInk in San Francisco, where we build stronger writers through interest-based curriculum, adaptive exercises, and actionable data.
For schools and educators, please press 1.
For account setup and training, please press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to an account specialist.

navigationGoals: Set up my educator account and schedule an onboarding session.
I’m a veteran new teacher setting up my NoRedInk educator account and need training.
I need to set up our district’s administrator account with SSO integration and get a walkthrough on teacher onboarding.
I need help setting up a new teacher account for my school.
I need to set up a NoRedInk account and schedule training for my high school’s physics club advisors.

contents.text: For curriculum and instruction questions, please press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to a curriculum specialist.

navigationGoals: Get advice on integrating NoRedInk exercises into my curriculum.
I’m a veteran educator looking for guidance on selecting and customizing NoRedInk curriculum.
I want to customize adaptive writing modules to match our school's curriculum standards and discuss best practices.
I’d like guidance on adapting the writing curriculum for my tutoring sessions.
I want to learn how to integrate NoRedInk exercises into our physics lab report curriculum.

contents.text: For students and families, please press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to technical support.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot a login issue preventing access for my child.
I’m a veteran student using NoRedInk and can’t log into my account—need technical support.
I'm experiencing authentication errors when students try to log in; I need help troubleshooting the platform.
I’m having trouble accessing the platform on my tablet and need tech help.
I’m experiencing login errors on my student NoRedInk account and need technical support.

contents.text: For progress data and performance reports, please press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to a data specialist.

navigationGoals: Obtain a detailed progress report on my student’s performance.
I’m a veteran parent checking my child’s NoRedInk progress reports and need access to performance data.
I’d like to retrieve detailed performance analytics for my class in CSV format and configure the API export.
I need assistance understanding my grandchild’s progress report.
I’d like to retrieve my recent writing performance report to analyze before finals.
